markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lahkgya (Patron of Monkeys)](/Deities.aspx?ID=191)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Steal luxuries for yourself, destroy property for fun, demand bribes to spare creatures from your torments

**Anathema** Work honestly for something you could steal instead, kill a monkey

**Follower Alignments**
CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17)

**Favored Weapon** [jaws](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Battle Axe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=16)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=16), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=53), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122)

- **3rd**
[Mad Monkeys](/Spells.aspx?ID=702)

- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48)

</column>
name: Lahkgya (Patron of Monkeys)
